sentences.sentence: At last Toyo entered true meditation and transcended all sounds.
sentences.translation: 最后丰雄进入真正的冥想，超越了所有的声音。

sentences.sentence: The Seller(vendor) is Toyo Engineering Corporation(TEC)of Japan.
sentences.translation: 卖方（卖主）是日本的东洋工程公司。

sentences.sentence: He had a little protege named Toyo who was only twelve years old.
sentences.translation: 他座下有一名小徒弟，唤作丰雄(Toyo)，时年十二岁。
